info.title: Monitor Heinz
info.description: In this documentation you will be able to consult the API Endpoints and also testall available routes.

get.description: Route responsible for fetching all users

post.description: Route responsible for creating a new user

get.description: Route responsible for fetching the last user created
Route responsible for searching for user by id

patch.description: Route responsible for editing the user by id
